original_title: Dickey Betts & Great Southern: Back Where It All Begins Live At The Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame
overview: As lead guitarist with the legendary ALLMAN BROTHERS BAND, Dickey Betts was one of the main songwriters of such legendary songs as "In Memory of Elizabeth Reed", "Ramblinâ€™ Man" and of course, "Jessica". Now, see Dickey Betts and his band Great Southern perform many of these classics in High Definition, with 5.1 Surround Sound and DTS audio.
title: Dickey Betts & Great Southern: Back Where It All Begins Live At The Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame
